rules_text:
When Tomb-Raider Duo enters, create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Satrapycycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Satrapy card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
notes: When the first mortal will in a century breached Golna’s catacombs, the first fear did too… but that’s nothing a second mortal can’t help with.
